src:
Petugas Imigrasi Takengon Ciduk WNA Diduga Langgar Keimigrasian
02 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Satiran


Petugas Imigrasi Takengon Ciduk WNA Diduga Langgar Keimigrasian

KBRN, Takengon: Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon bersama Tim Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh yang dipimpin langsung oleh Kepala Divisi keimigrasian Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh Herdaus, mengamankan Warga Negara Asing (WNA) di Takengon yang diduga melanggar Keimigrasian.
Tim mengamankan satu WNA inisial MB,yang kedapatan melanggar izin keimigrasian yaitu tidak terdapat izin tinggal dan dokumen keimigrasian.
Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon , Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra kepada RRI menyampaikan diduga WNA tersebut berasal dari Negara Bangladesh.
Tim Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh mengamankan WNA tersebut saat berada di kawasan Blangkolak II Takengon.
"Operasi dilakukan dalam pelaksanaan pengawasan keimigrasian terhadap keberadaan dan kegiatan orang asing di wilayah kerja Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon," ujar Kepala Divisi keimigrasian Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh Herdaus dengan didampingi Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon , Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra, Sabtu (2/11/2019)
Hingga saat ini orang asing tersebut masih dalam pemeriksaan intensif petugas imigrasi Takengon dan di tempatkan sementara pada Ruang Detensi Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon.
“Setelah kita lakukan pendalaman. Rupanya orang ini yang pernah masuk dari Aceh Timur, tahun 2015. Mungkin salah satu pengungsi gitu,”  tandasnya.
text:
Immigration Officer Takengon Ciduk Foreigners Allegedly Violate Immigration
02 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Satiran


Immigration Officer Takengon Ciduk Foreigners Allegedly Violate Immigration

KBRN, Takengon: Immigration Class III Non TPI Takengon Office together with the Aceh Kemenkumham Regional Office Team led directly by the Head of the Immigration Regional Office of the Aceh Kemenkumham Herdaus, securing Foreign Citizens (WNA) in Takengon who allegedly violated Immigration.
The team secured an initial MB foreign national, who was found to be violating immigration permits, that is, there were no residence permits and immigration documents.
The Head of the Takengon Class III Immigration Office, Takachon, Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra told RRI that the foreigner was suspected to have come from the State of Bangladesh.
The Aceh Kankumham Regional Office Team secured the foreigners while in the Blangkolak II area of Takengon.
"The operation is carried out in the implementation of immigration surveillance of the presence and activities of foreigners in the working area of the Takengon Class III Non-TPI Immigration Office," said the Head of Immigration Division of the Aceh Kemenkumham Herdaus Regional Office accompanied by the Head of the Immigration Class III Non TPI Takengon Office, Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra, Saturday. (11/2/2019)
Until now the foreigner is still under intensive investigation at Takengon immigration officers and temporarily placed in the Detention Room of the Immigration Office of Class III Non TPI Takengon.
"After we do deepening. Apparently this person who had entered from East Aceh, in 2015. Maybe one of the refugees like that, "he said.
